media.description: Per-image description. This text can be used for image-specific overlays or as a child caption.
media.alt_text: Screenshot of cave exploration with Wisp character

media.description: Short gameplay clip showing the cave entrance
media.alt_text: Gameplay video of character entering a cave

api_notes.per_media_caption: partial - Instagram Graph API requires creating child media containers for carousel items; some SDKs accept child captions but final post caption is often the main caption.
api_notes.user_tags: supported - can be passed per media when creating media containers (use user id where possible).
api_notes.alt_text: supported - Graph API accepts alt_text (accessibility_caption) on media containers.
api_notes.location: supported - use a location id when creating media containers.
